remarks: Congruence commutes on the left.  Biconditional version of Theorem 2.4 of [Schwabhauser] p. 27.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 12-Jun-2013.)
statement: cgrcoml $p |- ( ( N e. NN /\ ( A e. ( EE ` N ) /\ B e. ( EE ` N ) ) /\ ( C e. ( EE ` N ) /\ D e. ( EE ` N ) ) ) -> ( <. A , B >. Cgr <. C , D >. <-> <. B , A >. Cgr <. C , D >. ) ) $.
